p: The chemical compositions of J. communis, Z. officinale, O. majorana, T. zygis and R. officinalis EOs are presented in Table 1. GCâ€“MS analysis showed a variability between oils in term of compounds number as well as their percentages. A total of 58 constituents were identified in tested oils and were distributed as follow: 35, 9, 31, 30 and 13 compounds in J. communis, Z. officinale O. majorana, T. zygis and R. officinalis respectively.
